product_name: ProRack Hitch Carrier 4 Bike Hitch Rack
long_description: Affordable, easy-to-use, and sporting a simple design, the ProRack Hitch Carrier 4 Bike hitch rack carries 4 bikes securely and allows easy access to your rear cargo area when you need it. Dual-arm design securely carries bikes; rubber cradles and rip-and-stick straps offer quick and easy bike attachment. Short straps secure wheels to frame; long straps secure frame to rack. Mast tilts forward offering easy access to your rear hatch or tailgate-simply remove the pin and tilt forward. Threaded hitch pin helps reduce rack vibration, noise and wobble for quiet transport; hitch adapter sleeve lets you use in a 1.25 or 2 in. hitch. Sturdy steel construction features a silver powder coat finish. Carrying capacity: 4 bikes. Not intended for tandem or recumbent bikes; carrying bikes with step-through frames requires the purchase of an adapter (sold separately).
short_description: Affordable, easy-to-use, and sporting a simple design, the ProRack Hitch Carrier 4 Bike hitch rack carries 4 bikes securely and allows easy access to your rear cargo area when you need it.
